channel.title: Need help making a command
channel.description:
is there a way i can make a command to go into another players bank as an owner. i want to make a command to go into other players banks so i can ake out my friends items lol to screw around with him. if anyone knows how to do this please help me!
\im not a programmer so im lost =(

item.title: Need help making a command
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“checkbank”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++)
{
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null)
{
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1]))
{
c.getPA().otherBank(c, o);
break;
}
}
}
}

try that

Read full topic
